mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and yellow on white) announcing the Oxford Double Decker Festival featuring Wilco, Alejandro Escovedo, Kudzu Kings, R. L. Burnside, Continental Drifters, Amy Rigby, the University of Mississippi Gospel Choir, Honey Blonde, Circuit Riders, The Blacks, Rosie Ledet and the Zydeco Playboys, Paul "Wine" Jones, and John Mohead in Oxford, Mississippi on April 29.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
